column1: I hate people who run, who won’t even face themselves in the mirror. Who make up all this bullshit pseudo psycho babble to make themselves okay with how terrible they are.

I lost so much respect for you (what little remained), and I’m only aligning myself with people I know have my best interests at heart. And if that just ends up being myself, I will thrive as I’ve done on my own for so long anyway.

Fuck people that can’t face themselves, that can’t appreciate how fucked up they are, that can’t take the minute or two to be like ‘oh this isn’t how the world works, maybe I should change my shitty self.’
This is what I get for getting involved with a self-centered person. I shouldn’t have expected anything less.
"no one man should have all that power/the clock’s tickin, i just count the hours"
man i just can’t even comprehend the level of fame one direction are on
i’m over here like “WOOOOO 22 LIKES ON MY ART!”
and harry’s over there getting 71 THOUSAND likes on a picture of a stranger in 5 minutes
I don’t ever actually remember following Beyonce on twitter or Instagram. I just know that I do.

One thing that really tells me that we live in a patriarchal society is that my boyfriend is fine calling me a goddess without question- but I am afraid of calling him a god. Not because he is not amazing or strong or anything else, but because the connotation with god feels much heavier than goddess.

Being male and female counter parts to the exact same power level, this should not be so- God and Goddess are gendered notions of the same entity. However the word “god” has been associated with power, and “goddess” with beauty.

And if that is not a symptom of what our culture values in men vs. women, or what it sees in each sex, I do not know what is.

In fact, let me give you what my computer gives as the synonyms for each:
"god

1 (God) a gift from God: the Lord, the Almighty, the Creator, the Maker, the Godhead; Allah, Jehovah, Yahweh; (God) the Father, (God) the Son, the Holy Ghost/Spirit, the Holy Trinity; the Great Spirit, Gitchi Manitou; humorous the Man Upstairs.
2 sacrifices to appease the gods: deity, goddess, divine being, celestial being, divinity, immortal, avatar.
3 wooden gods: idol, graven image, icon, totem, talisman, fetish, juju.”
oh wait, guess what I learned while writing this post, it doesn’t have goddess, it redirects me to godless. psych.
